recordId.description: the recordId of the logical record the entry corresponds with

parentId.description: Version 1 CID for the previous HooksWrite in the chain

recordId.description: property that references a logical record.

contextId.description: deterministic ID for a contextually linked set of objects.

schema.description: URI string that indicates the schema of the associated data.

protocol.description: URI that denotes the Protocol an object is a part of

protocolVersion.description: SemVer string that denotes the version of the Protocol the object is a part of.

dataFormat.description: string that indicates the format of the data in accordance with its MIME type designation.
